SV1.why_it_matters: Canon for anti-singularity design, harmonic safety, and lens-led architecture.
extracted_constraints: Favor harmonic damping and decentralization to avoid runaway behaviors.
Model four-lens fusion as modular, tunable layers.
Keep the system small-scale, inspectable, and non-monolithic.

SV2.why_it_matters: Defines PhaseCube ethos: minimal, bounded, influence-not-command biasing.
extracted_constraints: Bias should influence but never overwrite lattice state.
Keep the prototype dependency-light and hackable.
Preserve plasma/liquid/solid phases with stochastic guards against collapse.

SV3.why_it_matters: Shows audio-to-depth/pan mapping, tunable controls, and visibility boosts for the lattice.
extracted_constraints: Map low frequency to depth and stereo pan to lateral bias injection.
Expose tunables like BASE_PATH_B_P, input strength/decay, and visibility thresholds.
Seed activity and analyzer-style feedback to keep the swarm visibly alive.

SV4.why_it_matters: Provides deterministic startup, audio-driven biasing, and HUD updates for headless-friendly loops.
extracted_constraints: Start with synth/fallback so the sim runs without mic permission.
Apply stereo-derived bias per z-slice with configurable strength and decay.
Keep FPS throttling to avoid busy-looping on fast devices.

SV5.why_it_matters: Collects tunables for grid size, path probabilities, and forgiveness damping.
extracted_constraints: Expose grid, path B, parity, and damping parameters centrally.
Surface forgiveness as a configurable safeguard.
Use modest defaults (e.g., grid 14, alpha ~0.16) to keep sim lightweight.

SV6.why_it_matters: Demonstrates lens-aware damping, plasticity, and audio fallback via synthetic oscillators.
extracted_constraints: Provide a silent synth fallback when mic is unavailable.
Incorporate lens-derived modulation of damping/path selection.
Maintain structural plasticity hooks for future rewiring (not necessarily implemented now).

SV7.why_it_matters: Minimal PhaseCube loop with path B bias and snapshot support for quick inspection.
extracted_constraints: Use plasma/parity noise plus path B branching to avoid stasis.
Provide simple projection/rendering-independent state handling.
Keep snapshot/export hooks for observability.

SV8.why_it_matters: Latest prior delta: headless runner with lens mixer, forgiveness, and bias pulses.
extracted_constraints: Keep headless execution with JSON/log summaries.
Route bias pulses through lens clamps and forgiveness operators.
Document tunables and testing hooks clearly.

SV9.why_it_matters: Shows controller wiring of bias ingestion, memory blending, and lens scheduling in the render loop.
extracted_constraints: Separate controller logic from lattice/math modules.
Allow adjustable memory weighting for bias blending.
Maintain autopilot-friendly tick scheduling using requestAnimationFrame-style timing.

SV10.why_it_matters: Implements harmonic forgiveness damping and bias-coupled Path B selection with precomputed positions.
extracted_constraints: Clamp Path B probability and bias coupling within safe bounds.
Apply forgiveness operator to damp divergence when dispersion spikes.
Precompute lattice positions for reuse instead of recalculating each frame.

summary: Adds a headless, lens-aware lattice runner with audio-inspired bias pulses, forgiveness damping, and tunable config/testing scaffolding under a new DeltaID.

assumptions.label: Treat docs/Parallel-Paradox-Design.md as the base docs README for SV1 because no docs/README.md exists.
assumptions.rationale: Directory index showed only this document under docs/.

assumptions.label: Use synthetic bias pulses instead of live audio to satisfy audio mapping constraints without browser APIs.
assumptions.rationale: Headless Node context lacks microphone/file input; aligns with prior headless deltas.
